org.lab99.mdt.view

Class ActionButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • org.lab99.mdt.view.Paper
          • org.lab99.mdt.view.Button
            • org.lab99.mdt.view.ActionButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener 

    public class ActionButton
extends Button
    ActionButton is a Button with a round shape, normally there is an icon in it, instead of the text in Button.
